system.description:
Features

Large, dagger-shaped wings

Elongated jaws with needle-like teeth

Dark, leathery hide

Drives

Take flight under the cover of darkness

Hunt from above

Tactics

Glide silently

Sudden, swift attack

These carnivorous creatures dwell in caves and ruins, and emerge at night to hunt. They have a lean, angular form, with a wingspan as wide as an Ironlanderâ€™s outstretched arms.

They typically feed on smaller prey, but a pack of hungry bladewings will harass larger victims, diving and slashing in coordinated attacks. During the long nights of winter, swarms of these creatures have descended on Ironlander settlements or unwary travelers.

Quest Starter:

Night after night, a colony of bladewings emerges to prey on a remote settlement. The creatures are rumored to lair in a long-abandoned @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironsworndelvethemes.d267fd935459da97]{Ravaged} @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironsworndelvedomains.8888b86e2afc8f1e]{Mine}. What is driving their attacks?
